summary: Code style suggestions for the scheduler implementation: simplify complex conditional logic by breaking it into separate variables, and clarify the use of while(true) loop for handling event exhaustion.
userImpact: No direct user impact; this is a code quality improvement suggestion for maintainability.
rootCause: Complex conditional logic in scheduler.ts that makes debugging difficult
proposedFix: Break up complex logic into separate variable assignments for better readability
resolutionDetails: Scheduler was simplified and the first nit was addressed. The while(true) loop was explained as necessary for handling event exhaustion when waiting for completions.
keyQuote: The scheduler might run out of events in case it's waiting for completions in which case it falls off the for loop and awaits the first completion.
